tool.name: SummaryOfReadQC
tool.description: outputs as plot of perGC, total-reads and Sailfish mapping ratio

param.name: input_fastqc
param.label: Select a 'GetFastQCRawDataFiles' output file from your history

param.name: input_sailfish
param.label: Select a 'GetSailfishCountInfo' output file from your history

param.name: job_name
param.label: Supply a name for the outputs to remind you what they contain

configfiles.configfile:
library("dplyr") library("plyr") library("tidyr") library("stringr") library("ggplot2") library("pairsD3") library("magrittr")
ourargs = commandArgs(TRUE) inf = ourargs[1] inf_sf = ourargs[2] outf = ourargs[3] outf_fqc = ourargs[4] outf_sf = ourargs[5] cat("input fastqc data:");inf cat("input sailfish data:");inf_sf cat("output file name:");outf cat("\n")
############ fastqc summary ############## path_list <- read.table(inf, header=T, row.names=1, sep="\t") head(path_list)
data <- ldply( as.character(path_list[["file_name"]]), function(x){ data.frame(sample_name = subset(path_list, file_name == x, select = sample_name), str_split_fixed(matrix(scan(x, what = character(), sep = "\n", nlines = 7, skip = 3), 7, byrow=T), "\\t", 2)) } ) %>% spread(sample_name,X2)
rownames(data) <- sub(" ", "_", data\$X1) data <- data[, colnames(data) != "X1"]
#file_name = str_sub(as.character(unname(unlist(data["Filename",]))), start = 1, end = 17) file_name = unlist(colnames(data)) total_seq = as.numeric(as.character(unname(unlist(data["Total_Sequences",])))) per_GC = as.numeric(as.character(unname(unlist(data["%GC",])))) outp <- data.frame(file_name,total_seq,per_GC)
outp\$cell_type <- str_split_fixed(outp\$file_name, "_", 2)[,1] outp\$well <- str_split_fixed(outp\$file_name, "_", 2)[,2] head(outp) cat("\n")
CIset <- function(x, y, g, w, conf){ data.frame(x=x, y=y, cell_type=g, well=w, upper = mean(y)+qt(conf,length(y)-1)*sd(y)/sqrt(length(y)), lower = mean(y)-qt(conf,length(y)-1)*sd(y)/sqrt(length(y))) }
plot_tseq <- CIset(outp\$file_name, log10(outp\$total_seq), outp\$cell_type, outp\$well, 0.99)
plot_t <- ggplot(plot_tseq, aes(x=x,y=y)) + geom_point(size=3, alpha=0.7, aes(colour=cell_type)) + geom_text(aes(label=ifelse(y<upper+0.1 & y>lower-0.1, "", as.character(plot_tseq\$well))), size=4, hjust=0.0, vjust=1.0) + geom_smooth(method="lm", se=FALSE, aes(group=cell_type)) + geom_ribbon(aes(ymin=lower, ymax=upper, group=cell_type, fill=cell_type), alpha=0.25) + scale_y_continuous(limits=c(min(plot_tseq\$y) -0.5, max(plot_tseq\$y) +0.5)) + xlab("Sample")+ylab("TotalSeq(log10)")+theme(axis.text.x=element_blank())
plot_gc <- ggplot(outp, aes(file_name,per_GC)) + geom_bar(alpha=0.7, aes(fill=cell_type), stat="identity") + ylim(0, 100) + xlab("Sample")+ylab("%GC") + scale_x_discrete(labels=outp\$well) + theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=8, angle=90))
ggsave(file="fastqc_totalseq.png", plot=plot_t, width=12, height=5, dpi=100) ggsave(file="fastqc_perGC.png", plot=plot_gc, width=12, height=5, dpi=100)
############ sailfish summary ##############
path_list <- read.table(inf_sf, header=T, row.names=1, sep="\t") head(path_list)
data <- ldply( as.character(path_list[["file_name"]]), function(x){ data.frame(filename=subset(path_list, file_name==x, select=sample_name), str_split_fixed(matrix(scan(x, what = character(), sep = "\n", nlines = 4), 4, byrow=T), "\\t", 2)) } ) %>% spread(sample_name, X2)
rownames(data) <- data\$X1 data <- data[, colnames(data) != "X1"]
file_name = unlist(colnames(data)) total_reads = as.numeric(as.character(unname(unlist(data[3,])))) mapped_ratio = as.numeric(as.character(unname(unlist(data[2,])))) outp_sf = data.frame(file_name,total_reads,mapped_ratio) outp_sf\$cell_type <- str_split_fixed(outp_sf\$file_name, "_", 2)[,1] outp_sf\$well <- str_split_fixed(outp_sf\$file_name, "_", 2)[,2] head(outp_sf)
ciset <- CIset(outp_sf\$file_name, outp_sf\$mapped_ratio, outp_sf\$cell_type, outp_sf\$well, 0.99) lower <- round(as.numeric(ciset\$lower,2),2)
ggplot(outp_sf, aes(file_name, mapped_ratio)) + layer(data=outp_sf, mapping=aes(x=file_name, y=1, fill=cell_type), geom="bar", stat="identity", position="identity", alpha=0.25) + geom_bar(alpha=0.7, aes(fill=cell_type), stat="identity") + ylim(0, 1) + xlab("Sample")+ylab("Mapped Ratio") + scale_x_discrete(labels=outp_sf\$well) + theme(axis.text.x=element_text(size=8, angle=90)) + geom_text(aes(label=ifelse(outp_sf\$mapped_ratio > lower, "", as.character(round(outp_sf\$mapped_ratio, 2)))), size=3, hjust=0.0, vjust=1.0)
ggsave(file="sailfish_result.png", width=12, height=5, dpi=100)
write.table(outp, outf_fqc, quote=F, sep="\t") write.table(outp_sf, outf_sf, quote=F, sep="\t")
if (nrow(outp) == nrow(outp_sf)) { ############ merged both summary ##############
merge_d <- inner_join(outp, outp_sf, by="file_name") merge_d <- data.frame(log10(merge_d\$total_seq), merge_d\$per_GC*0.01, merge_d\$mapped_ratio, merge_d\$cell_type.x, merge_d\$well.x) colnames(merge_d) <- c("total_seq","per_GC","mapped_ratio", "cell_type", "well") rownames(merge_d) <- paste(merge_d\$cell_type, merge_d\$well, sep='_') head(merge_d)
pairsD3(merge_d[,1:3], group=merge_d\$cell_type, labels=c("Total Seq(Log)", "%GC", "Mapped Ratio"), cex=5, leftmar=40, topmar=15) %>% savePairs(file = "fastqc_and_sailfish_result.html")
write.table(merge_d, outf, quote=F, sep="\t") } cat("....All Done. End of Script\n")
